title: Idea Arboris Consanguinitatis & Affinitatis Theoreticae & Practicae
creator: Sithmannus, Joann
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Sithmannus, Joann: Idea Arboris Consanguinitatis & Affinitatis Theoreticae & Practicae  In qua Iuris Civilis, Canonici graduum Computatio per Schemata ... traditur, & an & quomodo Iuris Canonici computatio in nostris Augustanae Confessionis, etiam in vicinis Consistoriis, & Ecclesiis dextre sit admittenda, demonstratur. Stetini  Berlin
publisher: Mamphrasius  Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin – Preußischer Kulturbesitz, Germany
